translation.en: We're doing the right thing.
No shame if you want to take your pass.
This has to be you and me.
Why do you think we're in the goddamn bathroom?
This is it. Last known address.
translation.ja: 住所は ここになってる

translation.en: A family here now. Our boys are long gone.
translation.ja: 別の家族だ　連中はいない

translation.en: All right, Disco.
See those yahoos? I'm going to jam them.
translation.ja: あの連中 俺が行くと 誰かが逃げ出す

translation.en: And when I do, one of them is gonna bolt. That's the one that's dirty.
translation.ja: あの連中 俺が行くと 誰かが逃げ出す そいつを とっ捕まえろ

translation.en: You bored or something?
This is their hood. Anyone knows Fremont and Coates, they do.
translation.ja: 奴らはフリーモントと コーツを知ってる

translation.en: Hold this, mija.
Get him.
Fuck off. You're in the wrong neighborhood, homes.
MAN: Watch out! Watch out!
Move!
Yo, Spencer.
I had him.
Why you running, man?
(GASPING) Hey, get me the fuck down, man. This shit's cutting me, man!
translation.ja: 助けてくれ　身動きできねえ

translation.en: What else? What else?
What the fuck are you doing?
So, what do they call ya?
They call me... They call me fucking Quicks, man.
translation.ja: 名前？　クイックスだ

translation.en: Quicks? Not quick enough. Quick.
translation.ja: “速い(クイック)”？　のろまだ

translation.en: Hey, get me the fuck down, homes. Please, man, this shit's cutting me, dawg.
translation.ja: 痛いよ　下ろしてくれ

translation.en: Fremont and Coates. They were staying across from the house you were partying at. You know them?
translation.ja: お前んちの前に住んでる フリーモントとコーツを？

translation.en: I don't fucking know them fools, man!
translation.ja: そんな奴ら 知るか！

translation.en: I'm a fucking Southsider, all right, ese? I don't be fucking party with no brothers and shit. Man, what the fuck you doing?
translation.ja: 俺はラテン系だぞ 黒人なんか知らねえよ

translation.en: They're from Belize. Shit! All right! Who knows them? Who knows them?
translation.ja: 奴らの出身は中米だ 誰が２人の居所を知ってる？

translation.en: Who knows them?
translation.ja: 奴らの出身は中米だ 誰が２人の居所を知ってる？ 分かった　言うよ！

translation.en: Look, mother... Hey, motherfucker, come on. All right, dawg. Look, look.
translation.ja: 分かった　言うよ！ サンペドロ通りに行ってみな

translation.en: Check this out, man. There's a baller cat on San Pedro, all right?
translation.ja: サンペドロ通りに行ってみな

translation.en: Dude's name is Grill, man. He's from 40s town, ese.
translation.ja: グリルってギャングがいる

translation.en: All right. Yeah. Grill. 40s town.
Grill, man. That motherfucker, he knows all of them, all right, man.
translation.ja: 奴ならきっと知ってる

translation.en: He's lucky he's not going to jail. What about him?
translation.ja: あのまま？ いい薬になる

translation.en: Hey. Come on, man. I'll run Grill through CALGANG.
translation.ja: いい薬になる グリルか データを検索しよう

translation.en: Hey! See if I can get an address.
translation.ja: グリルか データを検索しよう

translation.en: Police! Drop it!
Get on your face!
GRILL: What the fuck I do, man?
Get your ass in here, Disco.
Shit!
You got two strikes, Grill.
This is three strikes. Twenty-five to life.
translation.ja: これで懲役25年か終身刑だ

translation.en: That ain't my fucking shit. Fuck you.
You put that shit there. Dirty-ass, punk-ass cop.
translation.ja: 貴様が置いたんだ 汚いデカめ！

translation.en: Shit! Whoa. Whoa! Ludlow!
Whoa! Whoa! Stop!
Fuck, man. Listen to your boy, man. Shit!
Don't you have to ask him something first?
translation.ja: まず聞け そうだよ　何か聞け

translation.en: Homie right, man. Aren't you supposed to ask me some shit first?
translation.ja: そうだよ　何か聞け フリーモントとコーツは？

translation.en: Fremont and Coates, where they at?
translation.ja: フリーモントとコーツは？

translation.en: Fuck, man. Stop hitting me on my fucking head first
translation.ja: 殴るな　そうしたら話す

translation.en: Where do they fucking stay?
You're fucking crazy, man.
I don't know where they at.
Cats have been banned from the hood for a minute, man. If I catch them slipping, I'm gonna bust they motherfucking head.
translation.ja: 街から追ん出した 戻ってきたら 頭をブチ割る

translation.en: Answer the fucking question! How do we find them?
translation.ja: 答えろ　奴らは今 どこだ？

translation.en: The only cats I know that know them is up in the County, man. High power.
translation.ja: それを知ってる野郎は 今 郡刑務所だ

translation.en: I'm going to book you into County. For what, man? For what?
Talk to your friends, find me Fremont and Coates and you'll be out by tomorrow.
translation.ja: 聞き出したら出してやる

translation.en: Otherwise, I'm gonna book you for the dope and AK.
translation.ja: 聞き出したら出してやる でなきゃ 長期滞在だ

translation.en: Fuck, man! Fuck, man! (GROANS)
translation.ja: そんなひでえ話 あるか！

translation.en: I ain't no fucking snitch, man.
I know that.
translation.ja: タレコミ屋じゃねえ だから記録には残さない

translation.en: There won't be no jacket, no papers.
translation.ja: だから記録には残さない

translation.en: It's just you and me.
Fuck, fuck, fuck, man!
translation.ja: 俺たちの秘密だ クソッ！　クソッ！　クソッ！

translation.en: Come on, they ain't nothing to you. I want them.
translation.ja: お前に関係ない奴らだろ？

translation.en: All right, man. Fuck it, man.
translation.ja: 分かったよ　チクショー

translation.en: Mrs. Washington.
Can we talk outside?
Terrence had 50,000 in cash on him.
translation.ja: ご主人は５万もの現金を

translation.en: His death might be more than just wrong place, wrong time.
translation.ja: ただの 巻き添え事件だったのか…

translation.en: Might be?
How many people knew he was talking to Internal Affairs?
translation.ja: 主人と内部調査部の 関係は大勢が知ってた

translation.en: My husband had a good heart.
And when he started listening to it, he became a pariah.
translation.ja: 良心に従ったために仲間外れ

translation.en: His eyes opened.
When will your eyes open?
Terrence always said you were the worst one.
translation.ja: 主人が あなたは最悪と

translation.en: Because with all the shit going on around you, you choose not to see.
translation.ja: “あいつは腐敗に 目をつぶってる”と

translation.en: Look, I came here to help you.
Help me? You came to help yourself sleep at night.
translation.ja: 真相を暴くのが先では？

translation.en: That 50,000, you think Terrence was stupid?
translation.ja: あの５万は主人のお金よ

translation.en: He knew he had a bull's-eye on his back the second he went to Captain Biggs.
translation.ja: 命を狙われる危険が あったので⸺

translation.en: So we sold our house.
We were leaving Friday for the Bahamas.
translation.ja: 今週 バハマに越して 新生活を⸺

translation.en: To start over.
translation.ja: 始めるつもりだったの

translation.en: Silly of us, wasn't it?
Anything else, Detective?
No.
(LAUGHS) Luds!
What the fuck?
Hey. How's Complaints?
Oh. She was here? That's cute. Just missed your wife.
translation.ja: カミさんが来たぜ うちの女房が？　面白い

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.ja: うちの女房が？　面白い

translation.en: I got something for you.
That's for you.
That's it. Is that it?
Yeah. That's it.
You keep it. A nice little souvenir for yourself. But, Tom, this is...
translation.ja: 取っときな　思い出になる

translation.en: I mean, it's over.
Tom, this is over.
translation.ja: これで きれいに片づいた

translation.en: We got your back, Tom.
It's your man in high power. Yeah. I got that name. Fire away.
translation.ja: 俺だよ　名前を聞き出した

translation.en: It's this OG dude. Sell a little of this, little of that.
translation.ja: 言ってみろ 古顔だよ 年代物のキャデラックで ヤクをセコく売り歩いてる

translation.en: Drive an old-ass Cadillac.
translation.ja: 年代物のキャデラックで ヤクをセコく売り歩いてる

translation.en: Name. They call him Scribble. Scribble.
translation.ja: 名前は？ “スクリブル” 名前は“スクリブル”

translation.en: His real name's Winston or some shit. I don't know. Man, get me up out of here.
translation.ja: 本名は“ウィンストン”だ 早く ここから出してくれ

translation.en: It's on its way.
translation.ja: 本名は“ウィンストン”だ 早く ここから出してくれ 手続きする

translation.en: DISKANT: I can't believe this shit worked. Scribble. It's catchy.
translation.ja: 驚いた　うまくいくとはね

translation.en: I got a Metro unit tailing him.
translation.ja: パトロールに追わせてる

translation.en: Go get him, Disco.
You're not coming? Make me proud.
translation.ja: ドジるな 来ないのか？

translation.en: You married, Diskant?
Engaged. And I'd like to see her again.
translation.ja: 婚約してるから死にたくない

translation.en: Hey, you ever hear of something called the "cookie jar",
in reference to corruption, shakedowns, Serpico shit?
translation.ja: サツの腐敗に関係あるらしい

translation.en: No. Why?
A complaint I'm working on.
OFFICER ON RADIO: We're eastbound on Vernon passing Fig.
translation.ja: バーノン通りで見つけた

translation.en: That's a negative. Just keep eyes on and call it out. We're en route.
translation.ja: 目を離すな 今 そっちに行く

translation.en: Watch the crosswalk!
There he is.
We got him. Break off.
That's a rog. OFFICER ON RADIO:
nigga ♪ Dub-C, you better duck, Shit.
Hands where I can see them!
What the hell y'all supposed to be, man? Narcs?
Yeah, we're narcs.
Look how pinned out your eyes are. Taking a little off the top?
translation.ja: 目が泳いでる ヤッてんのか？

translation.en: Little jones maintenance?
You need to kick that shit.
translation.ja: 売り物のブツを？ ヤクは よせ

translation.en: I got a lawyer. You might want to talk to him. I got his card.
Yo, wake up. Nothing's happened yet.
translation.ja: 落ち着け　よく聞け

translation.en: But FYI, you know you got a no-bail warrant.
translation.ja: お前は保釈権を剥奪(はくだつ)されてる

translation.en: I put the cuffs on now, you're locked up until the apocalypse.
Well, whatever, man. I mean, take me in right now, dawg. I mean, read me my Mirandas.
translation.ja: 分かったよ　好きにしろ “権利”の朗読を

translation.en: Put your hands back on the fucking wheel!
Yo, two for two! Watch those fucking jokers.
translation.ja: そいつらを見張ってろ

translation.en: Get back! Get the fuck back!
translation.ja: お前ら　下がってろ！

translation.en: What the fuck you looking at, white boy?
Get the fuck back!
translation.ja: お前ら　下がってろ！

translation.en: You really want to kick heroin in County?
translation.ja: 禁断症状を ムショで味わうか？

translation.en: Want to see the judge all sick, shitting and puking yourself?
translation.ja: 禁断症状を ムショで味わうか？ クソまみれで ゲロを吐く？

translation.en: That would look real good. And for what? You're just a rung on a ladder I'm climbing.
translation.ja: イヤだろ？　俺に情報を 提供すりゃ片づくんだ

translation.en: What ladder, man?
How do I find Fremont and Coates?
translation.ja: フリーモントと コーツの居所だ

translation.en: Look, I ain't got no love for them banana boat motherfuckers, man.
translation.ja: あのクソッタレの バナナ野郎どもか

translation.en: But them dudes are straight monsters. They'll put me in a box if they think I'm snitching.
translation.ja: チクったら 俺はたちまち棺おけ行きだ

translation.en: I'm not asking to finger the guys in open court. I just want to find them.
translation.ja: “法廷で指させ”とは 言ってない

translation.en: Once I do, you're out of the mix.
I ain't seen them in a week, man.
You got a number?
No, I ain't got no number.
Them dudes drop phones all the time. They call me, man.
translation.ja: 用心して次から次に 買い替えてる

translation.en: Look man, your man making me nervous back here. Could you...
Look at me. Look at me!
You wanna see that judge or you gonna help me find them?
Look, I did business with them one time in El Sereno.
translation.ja: 一度 郊外のエルセレノで 奴らと取引をした

translation.en: Little bitty-ass house way up in the hills. That's it.
translation.ja: 丘のてっぺんのボロ家だった

translation.en: Show me.
You expect me to leave my car in the hood, man?
Someone had a party.
Smell that?
Want me to put it out?
No. Get the murder book.
translation.ja: いいや　調査ファイルを

translation.en: This is Fremont.
translation.ja: こいつがフリーモント

translation.en: And this is his buddy, Coates.
We found them.
Great.
Case closed.
These guys have been here a while. There's no way they killed Washington.
translation.ja: ワシントン殺しは 別の奴らだぜ

translation.en: You think?
Fuck you. I'm doing my best.
If Fremont and Coates didn't kill Washington, who did? Who're we chasing?
translation.ja: こいつらがホシじゃなきゃ 真犯人は誰だ？

translation.en: The assholes who smoked these guys, harvested their DNA and planted it in the market. That's who.
translation.ja: 誰かが こいつらを殺り 店にＤＮＡを残した

translation.en: I'm with you. But why do you frame two dead dudes?
translation.ja: なぜ死んだ奴を 犯人に仕立てたんだ？

translation.en: We're going to ask them.
Let's go.
What's up, man? You know there's coyotes out here and shit, right? Y'all been gone a minute.
translation.ja: 遅いな　コヨーテが ウロウロしやがって気味悪い

translation.en: You know these guys?
No, man. I ain't never seen these dudes.
Look, if Fremont and Coates call you, set up a meeting.
translation.ja: フリーモントから 連絡があったら⸺

translation.en: You tell them I can do for them what Washington can't anymore. They'll know what you mean.
translation.ja: 俺がワシントンの代わりだと 言ってくれ

translation.en: All right, man. I'll hook it up.
translation.ja: 分かった　伝えるよ

translation.en: Will you take me back to my car? Sure.
Have a nice swim? Yeah.
(CHATTERING) WANDER: I hope you guys are playing nice with the new girl.
I take care of him. Is Tom taking care of you?
translation.ja: トムは どう？ いい感じよ

translation.en: How's Complaints, Lud?
I'd rather scrape up body parts at a traffic collision.
translation.ja: 死体処理の方がマシだ

translation.en: See, Tommy falls apart when he's not chasing bad guys. He's always been like that.
translation.ja: ワルを追うのが生きがいか

translation.en: He was born without the fear gene. I could tell you some stories.
translation.ja: 命知らずだからな 聞かせて

translation.en: Tell me! No, no, we don't kiss and tell around here.
Now, I got the classic Tom Ludlow story.
When he was a rookie, I took him under my wing.
translation.ja: 奴が新米で 俺の部下に配置された

translation.en: It was a Friday night, and we're in Crip City, it's a project in Watts.
translation.ja: 奴が新米で 俺の部下に配置された 下町の黒人アパートで⸺

translation.en: Lots of dope, shootings, whatever, what have you.
translation.ja: 下町の黒人アパートで⸺ ヤク山盛り　銃がバンバンの 近所迷惑なバカ騒ぎ

translation.en: So, we get this call to shut down this house party.
translation.ja: ヤク山盛り　銃がバンバンの 近所迷惑なバカ騒ぎ

translation.en: And Tom, he's like the saltiest boot ever,
so I figured, you know, let's... Let's give him a lesson in humility. So I send him in there.
translation.ja: 突っ張ってた新米のトムを 単独で乗り込ませた

translation.en: Alone. (LAUGHING) And all of a sudden, all hell breaks loose, right?
translation.ja: だが その後が大変だった

translation.en: They got guys coming out the doors, homeboys flying out the windows...
translation.ja: ドアや窓から 人が投げ出され⸺

translation.en: Everybody's screaming inside. I rush in, I charge in, and there's Tom, busting heads.
translation.ja: 奴は独りで 殴る蹴るの大立ち回り

translation.en: They wouldn't turn the music down.
Tom's always gonna be Tom. He's like a guided missile. Locks on, that's it.
translation.ja: こいつは誘導ミサイルだ 食いついたら放さない

translation.en: (CELL PHONE BUZZING)
just talked to Scribble. DISKANT: Hey, so I Yeah?
translation.ja: スクリブルから連絡が

translation.en: Fremont and Coates, or whoever they are, want to meet us.
translation.ja: “フリーモントとコーツ”が 会いたいと

translation.en: When? Tonight.
I'll see you in Vice in an hour.
I know it's late. I'm sorry.
I wanted you to have this.
And that is?
It's the video of your husband's murder.
translation.ja: 店での ご主人の映像です

translation.en: It shows everything.
Why are you doing this?
Because I know how not knowing hurts.
translation.ja: 事実は心を癒やします

translation.en: When I lost my wife, she was with another man.
translation.ja: 俺の妻は男と不倫して⸺

translation.en: She had a blood clot in her brain and it burst.
translation.ja: 脳血栓を起こしたんです

translation.en: The bastard dumped her outside a hospital and...
translation.ja: 男は病院の外に 妻を置き去り⸺

translation.en: She died alone on the sidewalk.
translation.ja: 誰にも見取られずに死んだ

translation.en: Linda, I'm sorry for wanting to hurt Terrence
translation.ja: リンダ ご主人と争った俺を許し お悔やみを言わせてください

translation.en: and I'm sorry for your loss.
translation.ja: ご主人と争った俺を許し お悔やみを言わせてください

translation.en: I want you to know he didn't die alone,
translation.ja: ご主人は俺が見取りました

translation.en: and that the men who killed him are gonna pay.
translation.ja: 犯人は必ず捕らえます

translation.en: That won't bring him back.
And that won't bring your wife back.
I don't care.
Not in my name.
Please. Not in my name.
translation.ja: 私のために血を流さないで

translation.en: Blood doesn't wash away blood.
Shouldn't we roll with backup?
Fuck backup.
What? Why?
What do you think is gonna happen tonight?
You think I'm gonna throw the cuffs on these boys, drag them back to the barn and write it up?
translation.ja: 俺が２人に手錠を掛け ブチ込むだけだと？

translation.en: Here's the deal.
I'm going out there and you're going home.
translation.ja: 俺一人で行く　お前は帰れ

translation.en: And we are never, ever gonna discuss any of this again.
translation.ja: そして この件は忘れろ

translation.en: What? What do you mean?
It means Fremont and Coates never existed, and we never met.
translation.ja: “フリーモントとコーツ”を かたった奴は俺が始末する

translation.en: I'm not going home tonight, Tom.
Look, Paul.
This thing you want, that you think you want, you don't want.
translation.ja: お前の気持ちは分かる だが後悔するだけだ

translation.en: You don't know who I am or what I want.
Who are you to judge me?
You want to be a gunfighter, huh?
translation.ja: ガンファイター気取りか

translation.en: Then let's do it.
Back on the night watch, Tom?
You two keep being seen all over town.
translation.ja: お前ら 街中を うろついてるようだな

translation.en: Tom?
Did you really think I was gonna do nothing about you?
translation.ja: 俺が黙って見てるとでも？

translation.en: If you are gonna do something, do it now.
I know you want my scalp nailed to your wall. But then who's gonna go where the law won't?
translation.ja: 俺をつるし上げるか？ 法を超えた仕事は誰がやる？

translation.en: You, Captain?
You? You going to clean up the needles and baby parts?
translation.ja: 麻薬針や子供の遺体を 片づけるか？

translation.en: No. You need me.
All you company men, you hate me, but you need me.
translation.ja: 目障りだが必要なデカだ

translation.en: (SIGHS) Ludlow,
maybe you're right. Maybe we do need you.
translation.ja: 確かに お前が必要だ

translation.en: But goddamn if you don't need me, son.
translation.ja: だが お前も俺が必要だぞ

translation.en: Hey, Detective.
Did you ever ask yourself if Washington's dead because he was dirty
translation.ja: ワシントンが死んだのは 不正をしたからか？

translation.en: or because he came clean?
translation.ja: それとも告発したからか？

translation.en: Swap your rounds out.
We don't want the coroner digging department-issue ammo out of these assholes.
translation.ja: サツ支給の弾は足がつく

translation.en: Use the gloves.
Jesus. These are some serious manstoppers.
translation.ja: すげえ この弾丸 何人殺せる？

translation.en: So we're just gonna go in there and kill them?
No. I'm gonna ask them some questions.
Then we're gonna kill them.
Fucking time, man.
We good?
You know it's some bullshit, right? These dudes is monsters, man.
translation.ja: 分かってんのか？ 手ごわいぞ

translation.en: I mean, if they can't fuck it, rob it or kill it, they don't want it.
translation.ja: “ファック” “盗む” “殺す” それしか通じねえ奴らだ

translation.en: Ready?
Yeah.
Make the introduction.
All right. I tried to tell you.
Get the fuck in here.
You. Move to the fucking wall.
translation.ja: お前　壁の方へ行け

translation.en: What the hell is this? You know we're cops. Deal with it.
translation.ja: デカだよ　分かってるだろ？

translation.en: They cool, LaShawn.
Shut the fuck up, Scribble.
Yo! You think I'm fucking playing?
translation.ja: お前！ 壁を背にして立て 脳ミソをぶちまけるぞ

translation.en: Get your ass against the wall before you find your brains up there.
translation.ja: 壁を背にして立て 脳ミソをぶちまけるぞ

translation.en: We're here to do business. You want to feel me up, come on and try it.
translation.ja: ビジネスの話で ボディーチェックすんのか？

translation.en: Oh, shit. You want to feel his shit?
translation.ja: お前が お触りするか？

translation.en: 'Cause he ain't taking it out for you.
Chill the fuck out, LaShawn. Scribble say they good.
translation.ja: 落ち着け スクリブルを信用しよう

translation.en: Scribs, what's up with these fools, man?
They good, man. They cool.
Nigga, take a seat.
You want a drink?
No, we're good.
Man, we got the one-time up in here.
translation.ja: デカが お越しくださった

translation.en: Motherfucking po-po. Mmm-hmm.
Is there any square cops out there?
translation.ja: 手の汚れてないデカは？

translation.en: Or is everybody out for theirs?
